name: Happy Robot
description:
Happy Robot is a puzzle/platformer about a robot who is always smiling even though his life is pretty terrible.  

I will be uploading a gameplay video soon, I just wanted to give people a chance to play the game first ❤️

Controls:

FunctionControllerKeyboard / MouseMoveLeft StickW,A,S,D
JumpASpacebarPick up itemsXLeft ClickDrop ItemsXLeft ClickThrow ItemsYRight ClickPush Button / InteractBFSelf-DestructView Button (Select)F5

Links

Roadmap / Upcoming Updates

Game Source Code

Check out my Music!

Note - due to a bug in Unity this game is unable to be played in a browser, due to the way that I implemented dynamic music looping.  I'm keeping an eye on this issue and if Unity resolves the bug I'll gladly create a new WebGL build.  Also, for any fellow Unity devs out there please upvote this bug, I can't believe it isn't higher on Unity's priority list 😡
